channel.title: Client login error
channel.description:
okay so while working with my client earlier i got an error in my .bat that i dont know how to fix. ive already tried everything in my knowledge to fix it, but i still cant manage to fix it. heres the error:
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.drawHPOrb(client.java:12378) at client.loadOrbs(client.java:12430) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:10014) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8494) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9210) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:113) at client.run(client.java:4821) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
this is the line the error directs at:
[code] int currentHP = Integer.parseInt(cHP); [/code]
anyone help fix this? will rep++ for the fix<3 thanks much, l0lc0pt3r

item.title: Client login error
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

okay so while working with my client earlier i got an error in my .bat that i dont know how to fix. ive already tried everything in my knowledge to fix it, but i still cant manage to fix it. heres the error:

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string
: "%1"
        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at client.drawHPOrb(client.java:12378)
        at client.loadOrbs(client.java:12430)
        at client.drawMinimap(client.java:10014)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8494)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:9210)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:113)
        at client.run(client.java:4821)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

this is the line the error directs at:

int currentHP = Integer.parseInt(cHP);

anyone help fix this? will rep++ for the fix<3 thanks much, l0lc0pt3r
